SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT oname FROM orders o left join site s on o.sid = s.sid left join sitetype st on st.stid = s.stid left join gymnasiummessage g on g.gid = st.gid WHERE YEAR(ostarttime)=YEAR(now()) AND MONTH(ostarttime)=MONTH(now()) AND DAY(ostarttime)=DAY(now()) and o.state = 1 and g.hcode = #{hcode} GROUP BY oname ) AS d) AS people, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders o left join site s on o.sid = s.sid left join sitetype st on st.stid = s.stid left join gymnasiummessage g on g.gid = st.gid WHERE YEAR(ostarttime)=YEAR(now()) AND MONTH(ostarttime)=MONTH(now()) AND DAY(ostarttime)=DAY(now()) and o.state = 1 and g.hcode = #{hcode} GROUP BY o.sid) )AS c)AS site
select * from site s left join sitetype st on st.stid = s.stid left join gymnasiummessage g on st.gid = g.gid where g.gid = #{gid}
